item.title: TryHackMe The find command
item.description: Overview The find command Solved by @anir0y Task 01: Start finding Task 02: Be more specific Most of the time, you wonâ€™t be looking for something in your working directory. The first argument of your find command should be the directory you want to search. The command will search in that directory and in all its subdirectories. So, if you want to search the whole filesystem, your command should begin with find /.
